lastSession.summary: Opus 4.6 optimizations - effort controls, Agent Teams, 128K output (v5.0.0)
completedTasks: Added effort-aware phases to flow.md, do.md, do-tdd.md with per-phase effort tables
Added Agent Teams integration to orchestrate.md, do.md, do-tdd.md with Task tool fallback
Updated prd-breakdown.md for 128K output with exhaustive subagent analysis
Increased maxAttempts from 10 to 15 across all commands
Added adaptive loop strategy with progressive effort escalation
Updated session-start.sh with Opus 4.6 capabilities banner
Updated pre-compact.sh with native compaction awareness
Bumped version to 5.0.0 across all files
nextSteps: Run /claude-harness:setup on target projects to deploy v5.0.0
Test effort controls in a /flow workflow
